Paper.Title: Drawing Pictures with Natural Language and Direct Manipulation

Section.Paragraph: A multimodal user interface allows users to communicate with computers using multiple modalities, such as a mouse, a keyboard or voice, in various combined ways.

This paper discusses a multimodal drawing tool, whereby the user can use a mouse, a keyboard and voice effectively. Also, it describes an interpretation method, by which the system integrates voice inputs and pointing inputs using context.
